[00:00.00]Something Just Like This - Sabrina (Sabrina Orial)
[00:04.27]Written by：Chris Martin/Guy Berryman/Jonny Buckland/Will Champion/Andrew Taggart
[00:08.55]I've been reading books of old
[00:10.86]
[00:11.64]The legends and the myths
[00:13.59]
[00:14.10]Achilles and his gold
[00:15.99]
[00:16.64]Hercules and his gifts
[00:18.66]
[00:19.32]Spiderman's control
[00:21.74]And batman with his fists
[00:23.75]
[00:24.82]And clearly I don't see myself upon that list
[00:28.54]But she said where'd you wanna go
[00:31.75]How much you wanna risk
[00:34.07]I'm not looking for somebody
[00:36.43]With some superhuman gifts
[00:39.29]Some superhero
[00:41.25]
[00:41.85]Some fairytale bliss
[00:44.44]Just something I can turn to
[00:46.89]Somebody I can kiss
[00:49.13]I want something just like this
[00:51.51]
[00:52.04]Doo doo doo doo doo doo doo
[00:53.88]
